comment: I'm with Johnny he deserves support and she the lying person that she is deserves none
commentable_entity.title: everybody: Boycott Amber Heard
commentable_entity.description:
Given that:

 

1) Suicide is a leading cause of death in men

2) Divorce is a leading cause of male suicide

3) Amber Heard just filed for divorce against Johnny Depp

4) Her petition for divorce was just filed days after the death of his mother, which is one of the times in a man's life when he will be at his lowest point and needs all the support that he can get

5) Through her action in filing for divorce, Amber has shown herself to be an absolutely contemptible human being completely devoid of any compassion for anyone other than herself

 

We, the undersigned, have chosen to stand in solidarity with Mr. Depp and swear for the rest of our lives to boycott anything and everything that has been in any way touched by Amber Heard including any and all media she is involved with, including, but not limited to, her movies, TV shows, music, books, blogs, etc., past, present and future, as well as any charities she is involved with now or in the future, regardless of our own personal feelings for said charities, so long as she is a spokesperson. Even if she changes her mind later on, perhaps because of this petition, we, the undersigned, will not.

comment:
Most despicable actress ever  - now and in Hollywood history.
What time of person videos their spouse as part of their plot to conduct a smear campaign in the media to get his assets?
Someone who was really abused would get resolution via the courts.

And the fact that she got upset when Johnny directly made donations to the charities she specified revealed that she only said that for damage control. 
Very smart of Johnny to make the donations directly without the money passing through her grubby gold digger hands, because then those charities would have never saw any of the money.
Serves her right that she ended up having to pay her legal fees out of her own pocket.
I will never ever see any movie she is cast in. 
She got this Mera role by via the casting couch of the producer and Momoa.

comment: Amber Heard is a cruel and vicious woman who has used domestic violence as a form of blackmail. She has caused unreparable harm to our community by casting doubt on women who come forward with claims of abuse. Allegedly, she is an abuser and a narcissistic drug addict. For fact, she is a criminal who has broken the law several times. Amber Heard and her friends iO Tillet Wright, Raquel Rose Pennington, Joshua Drew, and Liz Marz have falsely accused an innocent man of domestic violence in an attempt to extort money from him. They are using this serious matter for their own selfishness and greed. Please do not let them do this without suffering consequences. Do not watch any film with Amber Heard. Do not watch MTV. Boycott these demons.

comment: The fact that Amber filed for divorce the next business day after Johnny's mom died shows how callous she is. Then asking for $50K/mo & when she didn't get it, THEN she files a restraining order a week after the alleged incident, asking for $ again?! That's not what RO is for! Not to mention moving bruises! Then she claims police are lying in 2 different police departments in 2 different states for 2 different incidents? Amber is the one arrested for domestic violence! Please sign & share!

comment:
To: Whom it may concern,
This woman is in the middle of one of the worst and most vile public smear
 campaigns I have ever witnessed. Today she will not be available for a deposition because of an engagement party in NJ & costume fitting in London. The fitting could have been changed. She has demanded justice for herself as well as her friends, speaking non stop to the press since May 27th to any and every tabloid that would buy her story and so called evidence not examined by the LAPD she has accused of being liars and bought off. She won't let the a court appointed expert examine it or a any doctor her so called bruises from May 21st.  Her claims are outrageous and her demands may be blackmail. Having her in this film or any film right now till this is all settled is a statement saying anyone can threaten black mail to someone for money and assets and get away with this. Carry on with their lives as if they have not committed a crime. Please re-cast this role so that the public will want to see this film. It is not fair to the other actors, director, writers and crew, every member of this crew and film deserves better. She is an huge insurance risk. If she can blackmail her own husband, she can cry abuse to anyone anytime for money and attention. Please re-cast her and buy her out if needed for this supporting role for now and do not take the chance till this case is resolved in a court of law and not resolved in the court of social media which is what Ms. Heard has been doing for two weeks now and will continue this onto your set, bringing her toxic persona there for all of you to have tip toe around for whatever time she is there. This may hurt the box profits and then there will be no undoing of this.  Sincerely,  Patty Sherman
